AAP.caption: Initialized/Updated
AAP.doc: Sent when Fielder has fetched all requested fields and published them to its outputs.
AAP.name: initialized

AAL.caption: Enter up to three Things with fields (simply provide a sample of the Thing in question). The field names of that Thing will appear at the "Field Names List n" outputs of Fielder. Additionally, a list describing each field's type is published as "Type List n".
AAL.name: fielder_info

AAM.caption: Thing 1
AAM.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 1" output.
AAM.name: thing_1

AAN.caption: Thing 2
AAN.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 2" output.
AAN.name: thing_2

AAO.caption: Thing 3
AAO.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 3" output.
AAO.name: thing_3

AAS.caption: By default, Fielder will return all field names in their native state as they come from the listProperties() method on Things. But you can modify that with the options below.
AAS.name: processing_info_3

AAT.caption: Suppress System Fields
AAT.doc: Set this option to "yes" to strip out the Bubble system fields that are shared by all Things. These are the fields 'Created By', 'Slug', 'Created Date', 'Modified Date', and '_id'.
AAT.name: no_system

AAU.caption: Convert to Title Case
AAU.doc: Set this option to "yes" to remove underscores (replacing them with spaces) and converting the values to Title Case. If set to "no", underscores will be preserved and fields will have their Bubble-native case (which is lowercase for custom fields and Title Case for system fields except for "_id".
AAU.name: title_case

AAV.caption: Remove Type
AAV.doc: Set this option to "yes" to remove the type values on custom fields (which are like '_text' or 'custom_some_custom_type'. If set to "no", type values will be preserved as part of the field name.
AAV.name: remove_type

AAb.caption: Thing 4
AAb.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 4" output.
AAb.name: thing_4

AAc.caption: Thing 5
AAc.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 5" output.
AAc.name: thing_5

AAd.caption: Thing 6
AAd.doc: Provide a sample Thing here and its field names will appear at Fielder's "Field Names List 6" output.
AAd.name: thing_6

AAf.caption: Editor Icon Color
AAf.doc: Use to change the color of the Fielder icon in editor view. This is, of course, the most important feature.
AAf.name: icolor
AAf.options: Classic Blue,Electric Green,Hot Pink,Enzo Red,Mustang Yellow,British Racing Green,Flame,Night Rider

AAg.caption: Debug Mode
AAg.doc: Set to yes to log some interesting information to the console, such as how long the plugin took to run, and what Bubble's internal representation of your field names are.
AAg.name: debug
